field.label: URI
field.helpText: The URI to the controller in the form tcp://host:port

field.label: Stream Name
field.helpText: The name of the stream to read from.

field.label: Scope
field.helpText: The scope name of the stream to read from.

field.label: Pravega Standalone
field.helpText: Indicates The Pravega Running Standalone or not.

field.label: Pravega Authentication Enabled
field.helpText: Indicates The Authentication Enabled for Pravega or Not.

field.label: Pravega User Name
field.helpText: The configuration value of Pravega User Name.

field.label: Pravega Password
field.helpText: The configuration value of Pravega Password.

field.label: Read Timeout (ms)
field.helpText: The maximum amount of time the consumer will wait for a message

field.label: Fixed Routing Key
field.helpText: The routing key of the message to write.

field.label: Routing Key Needed
field.helpText: The routing key is needed or not.

field.label: Routing Key Config Value
field.helpText: The configuration value of routing key.
